## Initial Data and R-Script

* Initial data: [data.csv](data.csv)
* R-script file: [srh.R](srh.R)

### Setting identificator, dependent and independent variables

```{r}
wid <- "{{ wid }}"
between <- c({{ paste0(paste0('"', between, '"'), collapse = ',') }})
dvs <- c({{ paste0(paste0('"', dvs, '"'), collapse = ',') }})
dat <- set_datatable(data, dvs, "var")
```

## Removing outliers from the data

```{r}
outliers <- {{ code.outliers }}
sdat <- remove_from_datatable(dat, outliers, wid, "var")
```

## Computation Scheirer-Ray-Hare and Pairwise comparison

### Scheirer-Ray-Hare test

```r
srh <- get.scheirer.test(sdat, dvs, between, dv.var = "var")
(get.scheirer.table(srh))
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
srh <- get.scheirer.test(sdat, dvs, between, dv.var = "var")
cnames <- c("var", "Effect", "Df", "Sum Sq", "H", "p.value","p.value.signif")
kdf <- get.scheirer.table(srh)[,cnames]
kdf$p.value <- round(kdf$p.value, 3)
kdf$p.value[which(kdf$p.value < 0.001)] <- '<0.001'
kable(kdf, digits = 3)
```

### Pairwise comparison showing only significant differences

```r
pwc <- get.scheirer.pwc(sdat, dvs, between, pwc.method = "{{ pwc.method }}", p.adjust.method = "{{ p.adjust.method }}", dv.var = "var")
(get.scheirer.pwc.table(pwc, only.sig = T))
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
pwc <- get.scheirer.pwc(sdat, dvs, between, pwc.method = "{{ pwc.method }}", p.adjust.method = "{{ p.adjust.method }}", dv.var = "var")
cnames <- c("var", between, "group1", "group2","estimate","statistic","p", "p.adj","p.adj.signif")
kdf <- get.scheirer.pwc.table(pwc, only.sig = T)[,cnames]
kdf$p <- round(kdf$p, 3)
kdf$p[which(kdf$p < 0.001)] <- '<0.001'
kdf$p.adj <- round(kdf$p.adj, 3)
kdf$p.adj[which(kdf$p.adj < 0.001)] <- '<0.001'
kable(kdf, digits = 3)
```
